meanings.definition: A piece of art made by sticking various different materials such as photographs and pieces of paper or fabric onto a backing.
meanings.sent1: She created a beautiful collage in art class using old magazines and colored paper.
meanings.sent2: The collage displayed at the gallery featured a mix of textures and colors.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the collage, creating a unique abstract masterpiece on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collage of memories, each one distinct and vibrant.
meanings.sent5: The collage of emotions in her eyes told a story of heartache and hope.

meanings.definition: A combination or collection of various things.
meanings.sent1: The room was a collage of mismatched furniture and decorations.
meanings.sent2: His speech was a collage of quotes from famous leaders and poets.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was a collage of delicious treats waiting to be enjoyed.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a collage of towering buildings against the sunset.
meanings.sent5: Her wardrobe was a collage of colors and patterns, reflecting her vibrant personality.
